chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Your Response:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

Your Response:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
None

Goal:
forall (n : nat) (a : ad) (la pl l : prec_list) (plp : pl_path), pl_path_incl plp l -> plp <> pl_path_nil -> pl_essence la pl <= n -> pl_path_incl plp (pl_produit_0 a la pl n l)

Premises:
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat For S: Argument scope is [nat_scope]
Inductive pl_path_incl : pl_path -> prec_list -> Prop := pl_path_incl_nil : pl_path_incl pl_path_nil prec_empty | pl_path_incl_cons : forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp la -> pl_path_incl (pl_path_cons a plp) (prec_cons a la ls) | pl_path_incl_next : forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp ls -> plp <> pl_path_nil -> pl_path_incl plp (prec_cons a la ls)
ad = N : Set
pl_essence = fun pl0 pl1 : prec_list => pl_card pl0 + pl_card pl1 : prec_list -> prec_list -> nat
Inductive pl_path : Set := pl_path_nil : pl_path | pl_path_cons : ad -> pl_path -> pl_path
pl_produit_0 = fix pl_produit_0 (a : ad) (la pl : prec_list) (n : nat) (l : prec_list) {struct n} : prec_list := match n with | 0 => prec_empty | S m => match pl with | prec_cons a0 la0 ls0 => prec_cons (iad_conv a a0) (pl_produit_1 la m la0) (pl_produit_0 a la ls0 m l) | prec_empty => l end end with pl_produit_1 (pl0 : prec_list) (n : nat) (pl1 : prec_list) {struct n} : prec_list := match n with | 0 => prec_empty | S m => match pl0 with | prec_cons a0 la0 ls0 => match pl1 with | prec_cons a1 la1 ls1 =>
Inductive prec_list : Set := prec_cons : ad -> prec_list -> prec_list -> prec_list | prec_empty : prec_list
pl_path_incl_length : forall (plp : pl_path) (pl : prec_list) (n : nat), pl_path_incl plp pl -> pl_tl_length pl n -> pl_path_length plp = n
pl_path_incl_next : forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp ls -> plp <> pl_path_nil -> pl_path_incl plp (prec_cons a la ls)
Inductive pl_path_incl : pl_path -> prec_list -> Prop := pl_path_incl_nil : pl_path_incl pl_path_nil prec_empty | pl_path_incl_cons : forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp la -> pl_path_incl (pl_path_cons a plp) (prec_cons a la ls) | pl_path_incl_next : forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp ls -> plp <> pl_path_nil -> pl_path_incl plp (prec_cons a la ls)
pl_product_1 : forall (a : ad) (la pl l : prec_list) (n : nat), pl_essence la pl <= n -> pl_produit_0 a la pl n l = prec_empty -> pl = prec_empty
pl_path_incl_length_2 : forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp ls -> pl_path_incl_length_def plp ls -> plp <> pl_path_nil -> pl_path_incl_length_def plp (prec_cons a la ls)
pl_path_rec_equiv_1_2 : forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp ls -> pl_path_rec_equiv_1_def plp ls -> plp <> pl_path_nil -> pl_path_rec_equiv_1_def plp (prec_cons a la ls)
pl_path_incl_ind : forall P : pl_path -> prec_list -> Prop, P pl_path_nil prec_empty -> (forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp la -> P plp la -> P (pl_path_cons a plp) (prec_cons a la ls)) -> (forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp ls -> P plp ls -> plp <> pl_path_nil -> P plp (prec_cons a la ls)) -> forall (p : pl_path) (p0 : prec_list), pl_path_incl p p0 -> P p p0
pl_path_rec_equiv_1 : forall (plp : pl_path) (pl : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp pl -> forall (d : preDTA) (tl : term_list) (n : nat), pl_path_recon d tl plp -> pl_tl_length pl n -> liste_reconnait d pl tl
pl_path_incl_length_def = fun (plp : pl_path) (pl : prec_list) => forall n : nat, pl_path_incl plp pl -> pl_tl_length pl n -> pl_path_length plp = n : pl_path -> prec_list -> Prop
pl_path_rec_equiv_1_def = fun (plp : pl_path) (pl : prec_list) => pl_path_incl plp pl -> forall (d : preDTA) (tl : term_list) (n : nat), pl_path_recon d tl plp -> pl_tl_length pl n -> liste_reconnait d pl tl : pl_path -> prec_list -> Prop
pl_path_rec_equiv_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (pl : prec_list) (tl : term_list), liste_reconnait d pl tl -> exists plp : pl_path, pl_path_incl plp pl /\ pl_path_recon d tl plp
pl_path_incl_length_1 : forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp la -> pl_path_incl_length_def plp la -> pl_path_incl_length_def (pl_path_cons a plp) (prec_cons a la ls)
pl_path_rec_equiv_1_1 : forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp la -> pl_path_rec_equiv_1_def plp la -> pl_path_rec_equiv_1_def (pl_path_cons a plp) (prec_cons a la ls)
pl_path_rec_equiv_0_def = fun (d : preDTA) (pl : prec_list) (tl : term_list) => liste_reconnait d pl tl -> exists plp : pl_path, pl_path_incl plp pl /\ pl_path_recon d tl plp : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list -> Prop
pl_path_incl_cons : forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp la -> pl_path_incl (pl_path_cons a plp) (prec_cons a la ls)
non_empty_pl_path_exists : forall pl : prec_list, pl <> prec_empty -> exists p : pl_path, pl_path_incl p pl /\ 1 <= pl_path_length p
forall_incl_length : forall (pl : prec_list) (n : nat), (forall p : pl_path, pl_path_incl p pl -> pl_path_length p = n) -> pl_tl_length pl n
pl_tl_length_ind : forall P : prec_list -> nat -> Prop, P prec_empty 0 -> (forall (a : ad) (pl : prec_list) (n : nat), pl_tl_length pl n -> P pl n -> P (prec_cons a pl prec_empty) (S n)) -> (forall (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (n : nat), pl_tl_length la n -> P la n -> pl_tl_length ls (S n) -> P ls (S n) -> P (prec_cons a la ls) (S n)) -> forall (p : prec_list) (n : nat), pl_tl_length p n -> P p n
pl_tl_length_prod_def_0 = fun pl0 pl1 : prec_list => forall (l : prec_list) (a : ad) (n m : nat), pl_essence pl0 pl1 <= m -> pl_tl_length pl0 n -> pl_tl_length l (S n) \/ l = prec_empty -> (pl_tl_length pl1 (S n) -> pl_tl_length (pl_produit_0 a pl0 pl1 m l) (S n)) /\ (pl1 = prec_empty -> (pl_tl_length l (S n) -> pl_tl_length (pl_produit_0 a pl0 pl1 m l) (S n)) /\ (l = prec_empty -> pl_produit_0 a pl0 pl1 m l = prec_empty)) : prec_list -> prec_list -> Prop
semantic_equiv_1_4_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (l : term_list) (n : nat), l <> tnil -> rec_list_terms d ls l n = true -> rec_list_terms d (prec_cons a la ls) l (S n) = true
pl_tl_S : forall (a : ad) (pl : prec_list) (n : nat), pl_tl_length pl n -> pl_tl_length (prec_cons a pl prec_empty) (S n)
pl_tl_length_rec_6 : forall (d : preDTA) (pl : prec_list) (tl : term_list) (n : nat), pl_tl_length pl n -> liste_reconnait d pl tl -> n = lst_length tl
liste_rec_length : forall (pl : prec_list) (tl : term_list) (d : preDTA) (n : nat), liste_reconnait d pl tl -> pl_tl_length pl n -> n = lst_length tl
pl_produit_0_incr = fun p0 p1 : prec_list => forall (a : ad) (l : prec_list) (n : nat), pl_essence p0 p1 <= n -> pl_produit_0 a p0 p1 (pl_essence p0 p1) l = pl_produit_0 a p0 p1 n l : prec_list -> prec_list -> Prop
pl_path_recon_ind : forall P : preDTA -> term_list -> pl_path -> Prop, (forall d : preDTA, P d tnil pl_path_nil) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (plp : pl_path) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a t -> pl_path_recon d tl plp -> P d tl plp -> P d (tcons t tl) (pl_path_cons a plp)) -> forall (p : preDTA) (t : term_list) (p0 : pl_path), pl_path_recon p t p0 -> P p t p0
pl_product_0 : forall p0 p1 : prec_list, (forall (a : ad) (l : prec_list) (n : nat), pl_essence p0 p1 <= n -> pl_produit_0 a p0 p1 (pl_essence p0 p1) l = pl_produit_0 a p0 p1 n l) /\ (forall n : nat, pl_essence p0 p1 <= n -> pl_produit_1 p0 (pl_essence p0 p1) p1 = pl_produit_1 p0 n p1)
Inductive pl_tl_length : prec_list -> nat -> Prop := pl_tl_O : pl_tl_length prec_empty 0 | pl_tl_S : forall (a : ad) (pl : prec_list) (n : nat), pl_tl_length pl n -> pl_tl_length (prec_cons a pl prec_empty) (S n) | pl_tl_propag : forall (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (n : nat), pl_tl_length la n -> pl_tl_length ls (S n) -> pl_tl_length (prec_cons a la ls) (S n) For pl_tl_length: Argument scopes are [_ nat_scope] For pl_tl_S: Argument scopes are [_ _ nat_scope _] For pl_tl_propag: Argument scopes are [_ _ _ nat_scope _ _]
pl_path_rec_length : forall (plp : pl_path) (tl : term_list) (d : preDTA), pl_path_recon d tl plp -> pl_path_length plp = lst_length tl
semantic_equiv_1_3 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list) (r : reconnaissance d a hd), dta_reconnait d a hd r -> forall l : liste_reconnait d la tl, pre_reconnait d la tl l -> pre_reconnait d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl) (rec_consi d a la ls hd tl r l)
pl_path_exists : forall pl : prec_list, exists p : pl_path, pl_path_incl p pl

```coq

induction plp using (pl_path_incl_ind (fun p p0 => pl_path_incl_length_def p p0) (fun _ _ la ls Hincl Hleq => pl_path_incl_length_def _ _) (fun _ _ => IHS)).
